snippet: At the U.S. Open, Federer showed that innovation isn’t a game just for the young.
abstract: Op-Ed article by Gerald Marzorati suggests raucous and unruly support expressed for Roger Federer at United States Open's men's final was in part due to aging fans who relish seeing Federer compete even though he is relatively older than other players; marvels at fact that Federer continues to try to innovate, as was evident during tournament when he introduced new service return.
lead_paragraph: At the U.S. Open, Federer showed that innovation isn’t a game just for the young.

headline.main: How Federer Thrives in an Age of Disruption
